parameters.description:
contrast_constants_by_label (default: {1: 0.93, 2: 0.99, 3: 0.99})

(contrast_constants) contrast_constants_by_label: Must be a map whose keys are label values and whose values
        are the variance-like contrast constant for that particular area; all values appearing in the
        pRF labels must be found in this map.
parameters.name: contrast_constants_by_label

parameters.description:
max_eccentricity (default: 7.5)

(import_retinotopy) max_eccentricity: May specifies the maximum eccentricity value to use.
parameters.name: max_eccentricity

parameters.description:
modality (default: volume)

(import_retinotopy) modality: May be 'volume' or 'surface' to specify the anatomical modality.
parameters.name: modality

parameters.description: divisive_exponents_by_label (default: {1: 1.0, 2: 1.0, 3: 1.0})
parameters.name: divisive_exponents_by_label

parameters.description: pRF_sigma_slopes_by_label (default: {1: 0.1, 2: 0.15, 3: 0.27})
parameters.name: pRF_sigma_slopes_by_label

parameters.description: compressive_constants_by_label (default: {1: 0.18, 2: 0.13, 3: 0.12})
parameters.name: compressive_constants_by_label
normalized_pixels_per_degree

parameters.description: gabor_orientations (default: 8)
parameters.name: gabor_orientations

parameters.description:
pRF_n_radii (default: 3.0)

(pRFs) pRF_n_radii: May specify how many standard deviations should be included in the
        Gaussian blob that defines the pRF.
parameters.name: pRF_n_radii

parameters.description:
saturation_constants_by_label (default: {1: 0.5, 2: 0.5, 3: 0.5})

(divisive_normalization) saturation_constants_by_label: Must be a map whose keys are label values and whose
        values are the saturation constant for the particular area; all values appearing in the pRF labels
        must be found in this map.
      * divisive_exponents_by_label Must be a map whose keys are label values and whose values are
        the divisive normalization exponent for that particular area; all values appearing in the
        pRF labels must be found in this map.
parameters.name: saturation_constants_by_label

        pRF labels must be found in this map.
